snippet: A man with a broken leg, a 10-year-old boy and a boat owner were able to swim to safety after a wave capsized their 19-foot vessel off the west coast of Kauai....

headline.print_headline: 3 Survive Capsizing, Make Night Swim to Safety
headline.main: 3 Survive Capsizing, Make Night Swim to Safety

lead_paragraph: A man with a broken leg, a 10-year-old boy and a boat owner were able to swim to safety after a wave capsized their 19-foot vessel off the west coast of Kauai.
